anthropic_config.system: Suggest creative perks or acknowledgments for sponsors to foster a sense of belonging and appreciation.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Suggest creative perks or acknowledgments for sponsors to foster a sense of belonging and appreciati...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
